H0.text: Stars change is the way in which the theory of plate tectonics provides the current explanation.

H1.text: Continents move is the way in which the theory of plate tectonics provides the current explanation.

H2.text: Rocks are formed is the current explanation for the way in which the theory of plate tectonics explains how rocks are formed.

H3.text: Tides are produced by the current explanation provided by the theory of plate tectonics.

A4.text: The model builds on the concept of continental drift, an idea developed during the first decades of the 20th century.
